website_summaries.verdict: Durable, vintage-looking bicycle that has a tough frame and wide tires.
pros: Offered in 5 sizes so you can find the perfect option for you
Tough tires with double wall rims to give you good performance
Steel frame looks great and gives you the durability you need
cons: Price is a little higher than expected

customer_reviews.title: ... a definitely a gorgeous bike but I am so disappointed with broken places
customer_reviews.text: It’s a definitely a gorgeous bike but I am so disappointed with broken places. I am not sure it’s a problem with its delivery or the product itself. I was looking forward this so much and was so happy when I finally got it yesterday.... I don’t wanna turn it back cuz it is so much work unscrewing it and pack... I thought maybe complaining people are kind of picky so they have such high expectations.. but it turned out there is a reason for their complaining. I feel bad... without these broken parts, I would give five stars but I am not gonna recommend buying it through online.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for a friend and helped her put it together. It assembles like any other bicycle I've ever owned but... THE LOOK. It looks fantastic! The real leather seat and handle wraps are absolutely superb and the green color is beautiful in person. The wheels came with a little wobble in them but other than that nothing bad at all. Feels great, she's enjoyed it for around a month now and she loves it. Can't recommend it enough. The basket is one of our favorite parts as well. Sturdy and rigid, doesn't feel like it'll be breaking any time soon, much less at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Bui

customer_reviews.title: Classy townie
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The green colorway looks stunning. My wife is 5' tall so we bought the Small size and it fits perfectly. Great geometry to be able to fit full 700x38C wheels on a small bike and everything still seems in proportion. We were leaving the local brewpub yesterday to bike home and there was a group of 5 people admiring the bike in the bikerack. It just pops. Amazing detail for a $500 bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is GORGEOUS. Comfortable, classic, and the leather trim is sturdy and so pretty. Unfortunately I have had two of these delivered and both arrived damaged so can't speak to it in motion as had to send both back. But visually, just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: H1202

customer_reviews.title: Dented fender problem, useless assembly guide, beautiful bike otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: I received with minor dent on BOTH front and back fenders, I noticed in other reviews that this was also the case for other customers-can Raleigh fix or sellers check before shipping? The packaging seemed so thorough yet this is clearly a consistent problem-see other reviews. Very easy to assemble-once I looked up a video online. The assembly guide was pretty useless, full of the most intricate details of correct assembly of every last portion of a bike-but not this bike in particular or how to put any bike together once received as shipped. Otherwise I would have given this a 5 star rating. Love the bike for aesthetics and quality.
customer_reviews.author: JCZ

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous bike! but a bit small if you are on the top end of the height range
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except that it is a bit small. I am 5'9" and I could use a couple of inches added in the length of the bike, "in other words" I am too close to the front wheel with my toes and could use more arm extension.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wells

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I decided on this Raleigh bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This bike is beatiful in every way! I am so glad that I decided on this Raleigh bicycle!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Geomtry so wrong
customer_reviews.text: Top tube is slopes up towards the head tube too steep and makes rider uncomfortable when standing still
customer_reviews.author: Urias

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received this bike for Christmas and was excited for spring to get it out of the box, put it together and start riding. I was disappointed to see the fender was bent in two places, a couple of bolts were missing and the beautiful leather on one of the handlebars was torn. In addition, I need to bring the bike to a shop because its making strange noises . Its an expensive bike so unfortunately I can't say "you get what you pay for". I would recommend going to a bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike
customer_reviews.text: Elegant retro design and no defect. Wrapped well when arriving. Took less than an hour to assemble. Hope they still have the green model but black is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chung

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bike, Fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Easy to assemble. Rides well. Charming looking and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: bike looks great and arrived when it should however the the derailed ...
customer_reviews.text: bike looks great and arrived when it should however the the derailed was not protected in the packaging and was bent - took my husband a several hour session to reset it .
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: The front fender was dented, the basket had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The front fender was dented, the basket had a dime sized hole poked into it on the bottom and there was a bolt missing from the front handlebars that I had to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Must sit upright which I'm not thrilled about, I prefer to lean forward a bit when I ride. I have the larger framed one and bought it on impulse, because my going shopping bike was stolen. It'll do for the rides to the store and back, but I use another bike for longer distances. It feels like a very cramped frame to me. In essence, I fell for a pretty face....which I don't generally do!
customer_reviews.author: Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. I'm 5'9 and the medium feels perfect for me. If anything, it's on the large side (but I certainly wouldn't go smaller) Assembly was a little challenging for me because the instructions are generic and not specific to this model. So I had one piece on the wrong way. I eventually figured it out by looking at a photo of the fully assembled bike online. You may find that helpful. I've enjoyed riding this bike a lot since I got it. No issues whatsoever. And I have to admit that I also love it because it's adorable. It looks SO good. Like it needs to be leaning against a patisserie in Paris
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! It's stunning. The basket is sturdy (not in my picture) yet heavier than I expected. The frame geometry is for very upright sitting, but the huge wheels make me feel uncomfortably high up. I imagine I will get used to this after a bit of riding. I just got it through my local Raleigh dealer so I didn't have the FedEx issues others have had. I'll update this post in the future after a few months of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Pingitore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality bike for casual biker.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable bike for a small adult or large child. I am just barely over 66 inches and it is decidedly too small with everything as tall as possible. It fits my 64 inch daughter well with the posts about halfway down. It is very easy to ride, and is geared for ease rather than speed. There is a single gear in front so you only have to worry about shifting one dérailleur. The shift mechanism is a ring on the handle grip that you just twist -very easy and intuitive. It has an attractive pannier basket that comes off quickly and has a carrying handle. I wish it had two.
customer_reviews.author: Hervian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Superb bicycle- Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: This bike is stunning and superb quality. No problems with shipping but ordered directly from Raleigh. I love this bike - it is one of a kind made by one of the original bicycle makers. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

product_meta.title: Raleigh Bikes Women's Superbe City Bike
product_meta.description: Designed for women with a serious sense of style and appreciation for the finer things, the Superbe is a gorgeous new ride from Raleigh made to match your signature style. This work of art is not only superbly comfortable to ride, but it also shows off your superb taste. With paint colors influenced by up and coming designer Madison Howe, each colorway is fashioned after a well-known shopping district-from British racing green representing London's Regent Street and classic black for New York's Soho district to iconic ivory for Chicago's Magnificent Mile and dusty pink for Beverly Hills' Rodeo Drive. Raleigh dressed these bicycles with beautiful lock-on leather grips, soft supple leather saddles with classic coil springs, historic Heron insignias inside the chain ring, custom wrap-around chain guards (to keep your treasured trousers from getting caught up), brass and copper etched nameplates, retro white tip fin fenders, brass bell, and removable wicker basket with handle to take shopping with you. The attention to detail is incredible. And this bike rides just as beautiful as it looks-from the smooth-shifting 7-speed drivetrain to the Superbe' s relaxed position that allows you to see what's up ahead and stop easily to smell the roses. The classic, low step-thru steel frame allows you to get on and off the bike easily, even in a skirt. The look and feel are indeed, in a word, superb.
feature_bullets: The Raleigh Classic steel twin tube low step thru frame offers a unique look, upright riding position and easy on/off
Shimano 7 speed Revo grip shifters shift easily with a flick of the wrist
Large alloy, double wall rims and wide Kenda 700x35c urban Brown tires with Gum side wall complete the vintage look
The removable, recyclable rear rack basket with handle allows you take it with you on shopping trips
Fashionable features such as leather grips and matching soft leather dual spring seat, and brass bell show off the Superbe' s signature style
